name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SEO Lens | A free tool for On-page seo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One stop solution for on-page SEO reports. Get your reports and improve your SEO in 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SEO Lens is your ultimate free tool for comprehensive on-page SEO optimization.

IMPORTANT:
 - The extension will not work in tabs that were open prior to installation. After installing this extension, either reload your open tabs or restart Chrome.
- We do not collect any data or store any personal information.

With just one click, you can generate comprehensive SEO reports that cover all crucial elements, including:
- title and descriptions 
- Image 
- Link
- Structured data
- Heading structure
- Social tags (OG and Twitter)
- Canonical tags
- Robots.txt
- Sitemaps
- Robots meta tags
and more

Streamline your SEO workflow and elevate your websiteâ€™s performance effortlessly.
